New Records: Pakistan achieved their highest score in a T20I match with 152 runs.
Shaheen Shah Afridi became the fastest bowler to take 50 T20I wickets.
Key Match Events: The match ended early with Pakistan winning by 10 wickets, with 13 balls remaining.
Virat Kohli scored 57 runs, his second-highest T20I score.
Mohammad Rizwan and Babar Azam contributed significantly with 79 and 68 runs, respectively.
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and chose to bat first.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan's win was their second in the tournament, moving them closer to the semi-finals.
The match was notable for Shaheen Shah Afridi's performance, which earned him the Player of the Match award.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 1361st T20I, highlighting its position in the series.
The venue was the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
